Literature.Title: Sustainable, Site-Specific Linkage of Antimicrobial Peptides to Cotton Textiles.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=100-200µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=0.097µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>=200µM)
